info.title: AMCS Pay External API
info.description: # Getting Started ## Document Purpose and Scope This document contains a technical description of the AMCS Pay REST API endpoints. The purpose of this document is to provide readers with details on how to integrate into the AMCS Pay REST API. ## About AMCS Pay AMCS Pay offers waste & recycling operators feature-rich payment services that broaden their ability to compete in a rapidly evolving marketplace. The services include card payments, ACH payments, Google Pay, Apple Pay, and many alternative payment methods. AMCS Pay supports multiple recognized industry partners such as Global Payments, ACI Worldwide etc. ## Communicating to AMCS Pay API First, a calling application will have to register as a Tenant. Upon successful registration a private key is generated which will serve as the Personal Access Token (PAT). The Tenant Private Key is then supplied during authentication and authorization through the ("/authTokens") endpoint. This creates a cookie, which needs to be tracked in a cookie container. Subsequent calls to the REST API will then use this cookie to authenticate and authorize requests.

post.description: This endpoint is used for authentication and authorization of a calling application by supplying the **Tenant Private Key** in the **privateKey** property. When successful, _Platform.PAY.SessionToken_ is added to the cookie.

schema.description: Subsequent calls to the REST API will use this cookie to authenticate and authorize requests.

post.description:
| Property                  | Description  |
| ------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| RequestType                      |Request Type can be  "OneOffPayment" "OneOffPaymentAndTokenization" "Tokenization".                            |
| PaymentType               | Payment Type can be "Card" "ACH " "GooglePay" "ApplePay" .                      |
| TransactionOrigin                 | Transaction Origin can be "Moto" "Ecom"        |
| CallerIdentifier               | The CallerIdentifier associated to the Payment request.             |
| CallerTransactionId               | The CallerTransactionId associated to the Payment request.        |
| CallerIPAddress               |CallerIP Address associated to the the payment request.        |
| RequestTimeStamp               |The RequestTimeStamp associated to the payment request in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD).        |
| ProvideType                   |Provide Type can be "ACICards" "ACIElectronic" "Heartland" "MerchantPartners"  "Payment Express" "Realex"        |
| TransactionAmount                     |The amount associated to the payment request.        |
| HPPTransactionRequest                         | The HPPTransaction Request associated to the customer.                |
| CallerTransactionId                 |The CallerTransactionId associated with the Payment response.        |
| AmcsPayReference               | The  Amcs Pay Reference associated to the payment response.        |
| ResponseTimestamp                 |The ResponseTimestamp associated to the payment response in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD).            |
| TransactionStatus           |Transaction Status can be "Initiated" "Success" "Failure" "Timeout" Or "Cancelled"

Get Customer Invoice Details API create the record in payment transaction table

.

## Request And Response

| Property                  | Description  |
| ------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| CustomerARCode                      | The account code used for Accounts Receivable.        (AMCS will provide the account ARCode)                             |
| Channel               | Channel can be only MOBILL OR IVR                         |
| CustomerGuid                 | The GUID associated to the customer.        |
| CustomerName               |The customer's name.        |
| CustomerBalance               |The amount associated to the payment.        |
| CustomerCurrency               | Customer Currency associated with the Customer account.        |
| InvoiceDetails               |It will show all the invoices associated with the account               |
| InvoiceNumber                   |The invoice number associated to the invoice. Filterable.        |
| InvoiceGUID                     |The GUID associated to the invoice.        |
| InvoiceDate                     |The invoiceDate associated to the invoice in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD).        |
| ZipCode                         |Zip code is associated with the account               |
| InvoiceDueDate                  |The dueDate associated to the invoice in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD).        |
| UnallocatedAmount               |The Unallocated Amount on the customers account.        |
| InvoiceCurrency                 |Invoice Currency asscoaited with the customer account             |
| TransactionReference            |Transaction Reference associated with account                 |
| ZipCode                         |ZipCode associated with the account address                                |
| InvoiceDate                     |The invoiceDate associated to the invoice in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD).        |
| LastPaymentDate                 |When the last payment was made                     |
| MakePaymentLink                 |It shows the payment link (if any invoice available)                     |
| IsActive                 |Whether the customer is active              |
| MobillsEnrollment               |Whether the mobills enrollment is active.              |
| GUID         |Guid associated with the account

privateKey.description: This is a Personal Access Token (PAT) associated to the tenant.

authResult.description: The authentication result. Returns "ok" if successful otherwise returns "invalidCredentials".

userName.description: The username assigned to the default tenant user.

userIdentity.description: The user identity associated to the user.

sysUserId.description: The ID associated to the user.

userGuid.description: The GUID associated to the user.

companyOutletId.description: The ID associated to the Company outlet.

companyOutletGuid.description: The GUID associated to the Company outlet.

stayLoggedIn.description: The boolean flag used when user opts to stay logged in. (usually set in a 'Remember me' checkbox)

amcsPayTransactionGuid.description: The GUID associated to the payment request.

callerTransactionId.description: The GUID associated to the payment request.

providerReference.description: The reference number associated to the payment provider.

amcsPayReference.description: The ID associated to the payment reference sent by the provider in the payload response.

responseCode.description: The status code associated to the response.

notes.description: More information associated to the payment.

providerAuthCode.description: The authorization code associated to the payment provider.

additionalProviderData.description: More information associated to the payment provider.

responseTimeStamp.description: The timestamp of the payment response payload.
